author: PTI
title: Lata Mangeshkar, Priyanka Chopra, Vicky Kaushal pledge donations to coronavirus funds
description: Katrina Kaif and Alia Bhatt among other stars to contribute to PM-CARES and the Chief Minister’s Relief Fund
content:
Legendary singer Lata Mangeshkar, actors Priyanka Chopra, Alia Bhatt, Vicky Kaushal, among others on Tuesday pledged money to various relief funds aimed at combating the coronavirus pandemic in the country.
